Egniol potions are a type of potion that can be made whilst in The Gauntlet. It restores prayer, run energy, and acts as a stamina potion.

Contents

  • 1 Creation
    • 1.1 The Gauntlet
    • 1.2 The Corrupted Gauntlet
  • 2 Changes
    • 2.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 3 Trivia

Creation[edit | edit source]

  1. Fill a vial with water at a Water Pump to receive a water-filled vial.
  2. Use a grym leaf on the water-filled fial to receive a grym potion (unf).
  3. Use a pestle and mortar with ten crystal shards to receive ten crystal dust.
  4. Use the ten crystal dust with the grym potion (unf) to receive an Egniol potion (3).

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 July 2020
(update)

The inventory icon of the Egniol potion has been graphically updated to match the look of normal potions.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Egniol is a Welsh word meaning energetic.
